```{r include=FALSE}

carpeta <- paste0("./RESULTATS_",ID)
dir.create(carpeta)

resultatsplots <- paste0(carpeta,"/","PLOTS")
resultatstaules <- paste0(carpeta,"/","TAULES")
resultatsobjectes <- paste0(carpeta,"/","OBJECTES_R")

dir.create(resultatsplots)
dir.create(resultatstaules)
dir.create(resultatsobjectes)

```

```{r include=FALSE}
## Global options

source("/usr/local/lib/R/site-library/AnalisisArrays2/templates/llibreries_Informes.R")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = F,message = F,class.source = "watch-out")

library(oligo)
library(DT)
library(clusterProfiler)
library(genefilter)
library(dplyr)
library(rrvgo)

datatable_jm<-function(x,column=NULL){
datatable(
  x,
  extensions = 'Buttons',
  filter = list(position = 'top', clear = T),
  options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                 scrollX = TRUE, scrollCollapse = TRUE,
                 # buttons = list(list(extend = 'colvis')),
                 buttons = list(list(extend = 'colvis'),'copy', 'print',
                                list(extend = 'collection',
                                     buttons = c('csv', 'excel', 'pdf'),
                                     text = 'Download')),
                 columnDefs = list(list(visible=FALSE, targets=column))))}

```


```{r eval=FALSE}
# Differential expression analysis with limma
library(GEOquery)
library(limma)
library(umap)

# load series and platform data from GEO

gset <- getGEO("GSE71729", GSEMatrix =TRUE, AnnotGPL=TRUE)

## check how many platforms used
length(gset)
## if more than one dataset is present, you can analyse the other dataset by changing the number inside the [[...]]

gset<-gset[[1]]

save(gset, file= paste0(resultatsobjectes,"/gset"))


# En aquest dataset hi ha diferents tipus de mostres: 
# Data include 145 primary and 61 metastatic PDAC tumors, 17 cell lines, 46 pancreas and 88 distant site adjacent normal samples. 
# Arrays represent distinct samples.

png(paste0(carpeta, "/boxplot.png"))
boxplot(gset,las=2)
dev.off()

```

Boxplot de totes les mostres del gset

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0(carpeta, "/boxplot.png"), dpi = 100)
```

# Normalització
Es normalitzen les dades
```{r eval=FALSE, include=TRUE}
library(affyPLM)
gset_norm <-normalize.ExpressionSet.quantiles(gset, transfn="none")

save(gset_norm,file= paste0(resultatsobjectes, "/gset_norm"))

```

# Expressió de PLAC8
Boxplot de les dades normalitzades 
```{r}
load(paste0(resultatsobjectes, "/gset_norm"))

matriu_exprs <- exprs(gset_norm) 
boxplot(gset_norm, las=2)
```


# Expressió diferencial grups (high/low expression PLAC8)
Es realitza l'expressió diferencial en funció de la mediana o els quartils Q1 vs Q4 de l'expressió de PLAC8 

## Median 
```{r}
library(clusterProfiler)
library(genefilter)
library(dplyr)
library(limma)

median <- median(matriu_exprs[gset_norm@featureData@data$ID[gset_norm@featureData@data$ID=="PLAC8"],])

gset_norm@phenoData@data$gmedian <-
unlist(as.list(exprs(gset_norm[gset_norm@featureData@data$ID=="PLAC8",])>median))

## Control vs Caso

groups = gset_norm@phenoData@data$gmedian
groups<-gsub("FALSE","LOW",groups)
groups<-gsub("TRUE","HIGH",groups)
groups<-as.factor(groups)

design = model.matrix(~ 0 + groups)
colnames(design)<-gsub("groups","",colnames(design))

data.fit = lmFit(matriu_exprs,design)

contrast.matrix = makeContrasts(LOW-HIGH,levels=design)
data.fit.con = contrasts.fit(data.fit,contrast.matrix)
data.fit.eb = eBayes(data.fit.con)

table_DEG_median <- topTable(data.fit.eb, number = Inf,adjust.method = "fdr",genelist = gset_norm@featureData@data)

# dim(table_DEG_median)

table_DEG_sig_median <- table_DEG_median %>%
                   filter(adj.P.Val<=0.05)

dim(table_DEG_sig_median)

save(table_DEG_median, file= paste0(resultatstaules,"/table_DEG_median"))
save(table_DEG_sig_median, file= paste0(resultatstaules, "/table_DEG_sig_median"))
```

Taula de gens diferencialment expressats significatius (4702 gens)
```{r}
load(paste0(resultatstaules,"/table_DEG_sig_median"))

datatable_jm(table_DEG_sig_median)
             # column = c("GO.Process", "GO.Function","GO.Process.ID", "GO.Function.ID"))

```


### GO_GSEA
```{r}
load(paste0(resultatstaules,"/table_DEG_sig_median"))
load(paste0(resultatstaules,"/table_DEG_median"))

# GO GSEA

library(org.Hs.eg.db)
library(clusterProfiler)

table_DEG_complete<-
  table_DEG_median[table_DEG_median$ID!="",]

table_DEG_complete<-
table_DEG_complete %>% 
  group_by(ID) %>% 
    filter(adj.P.Val==min(adj.P.Val))

geneList<-table_DEG_complete$logFC
names(geneList)<-table_DEG_complete$ID

geneList<-geneList[order(geneList, decreasing = TRUE)]

set.seed(123)
GO_gsea <- gseGO(geneList     = geneList, keyType = "SYMBOL",
              OrgDb        = org.Hs.eg.db,
              ont          = "BP",
                # minGSSize    = 100,
                # maxGSSize    = 500,
              pvalueCutoff = 0.05,
              verbose      = T
              )

# GO_gsea
GO_gsea <- setReadable(GO_gsea, OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db, keyType="SYMBOL")

save(GO_gsea, file= paste0(resultatsobjectes,"/GO_gsea_median"))
```


```{r}
load(paste0(resultatstaules,"/table_DEG_sig_median"))
load(paste0(resultatstaules,"/table_DEG_median"))
load(paste0(resultatsobjectes,"/GO_gsea_median"))
# reducedTerms

GO_gsea_df<-GO_gsea@result
GO_gsea_df<-GO_gsea@result %>%
  filter(p.adjust<=0.25)

table_DEG_complete<-
  table_DEG_median[table_DEG_median$ID!="",]

save(table_DEG_complete, file = paste0(resultatstaules,"/table_DEG_complete"))

num_gens <-unlist(lapply(GO_gsea_df$core_enrichment, function(x) sum(table_DEG_complete$symbol%in%strsplit(x ,"/")[[1]]) ))
name_gens <-unlist(lapply(GO_gsea_df$core_enrichment, function(x) paste(table_DEG_complete$symbol[(table_DEG_complete$symbol%in%strsplit(x,"/")[[1]])],collapse = "/") ))

GO_gsea_df$num_gens<-num_gens
GO_gsea_df$name_gens<-name_gens

library(rrvgo)

simMatrix <- calculateSimMatrix(GO_gsea_df$ID,
                                orgdb="org.Hs.eg.db",
                                ont="BP",
                                method="Rel")

scores <- setNames(-log10(GO_gsea_df$qvalue), GO_gsea_df$ID)

reducedTerms_median <- reduceSimMatrix(simMatrix,
                                scores,
                                threshold=0.7,
                                orgdb="org.Hs.eg.db")

png(paste0(resultatsplots, "/treemapplot_median.png"),width = 900,height = 600,res=100)
treemapPlot(reducedTerms_median)
dev.off()
```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0(resultatsplots, "/treemapplot_median.png"), dpi = 100)
```

### KEGG GSEA

```{r}
gene_enetrezID <- bitr(table_DEG_complete$ID, fromType = "SYMBOL", toType = "ENTREZID",OrgDb = "org.Hs.eg.db")

table_DEG_complete$ENTREZID<-gene_enetrezID$ENTREZID[match(table_DEG_complete$ID,gene_enetrezID$SYMBOL)]

```

```{r}
geneList<-table_DEG_complete$logFC
names(geneList)<-table_DEG_complete$ENTREZID

geneList<-geneList[order(geneList, decreasing = TRUE)]
set.seed(123)
kegg_gsea <- gseKEGG(geneList     = geneList,
               organism     = 'hsa',
               # minGSSize    = 120,
               pvalueCutoff = 0.05,
               verbose      = FALSE
               )

kegg_gsea <- setReadable(kegg_gsea, OrgDb = org.Hs.eg.db, keyType="ENTREZID")

save(kegg_gsea,file = paste0(resultatsobjectes, "/kegg_gsea_median"))
```

```{r}
load(paste0(resultatsobjectes, "/kegg_gsea_median"))

kegg_gsea_df<-kegg_gsea@result
kegg_gsea_df<-kegg_gsea@result %>%
  filter(p.adjust<=0.25) 

# kegg_gsea_df<-kegg_gsea_df[grepl(keys,kegg_gsea@result$Description,ignore.case = T),]

num_gens<-unlist(lapply(kegg_gsea_df$core_enrichment, function(x) sum(table_DEG_complete$Gene.symbol%in%strsplit(x ,"/")[[1]]) ))
name_gens<-unlist(lapply(kegg_gsea_df$core_enrichment, function(x) paste(table_DEG_complete$Gene.symbol[(table_DEG_complete$Gene.symbol%in%strsplit(x,"/")[[1]])],collapse = "/") ))

kegg_gsea_df$num_gens<-num_gens
kegg_gsea_df$name_gens<-name_gens

kegg_gsea_df<-
kegg_gsea_df %>% 
  mutate(NES_cat=ifelse(NES<0,"Down","Up"))

kegg_gsea_df_p<-kegg_gsea_df %>%
  group_by(NES_cat) %>% 
  arrange(pvalue) %>%  
  slice_head(n=20)

kegg_graph <- kegg_gsea_df_p %>% group_by(NES_cat) %>%
    slice_head(n=10) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = NES, y = fct_reorder(Description, NES))) + 
  geom_segment(aes(yend = Description,colour = p.adjust), xend = 0, size=3) +
  geom_point(aes(color = p.adjust),size = 5) +
    theme_bw(base_size = 15) +
  theme(text = element_text(size=12))+
    # scale_colour_gradient(limits=c(0, pvalue), low="red") +
    ylab(NULL)+
    # ggtitle(paste0("First ",num_GO, " up & ", num_GO," down regulated specific GO"))+
    facet_grid(.~NES_cat,scales = "free")+
  scale_colour_continuous(low = "#f29191",
                         high = "#4ca4fc")

kegg_gsea_df_median <- kegg_gsea_df

png(paste0(resultatsplots, "/kegg_graph_median.png"),width = 900,height = 600,res=100)
kegg_graph
dev.off()

save(kegg_gsea_df_median,file = paste0(resultatstaules, "/kegg_gsea_df_median"))

```

```{r}
datatable_jm(kegg_gsea_df_median, column = c("core_enrichment"))

```

```{r}
knitr::include_graphics(paste0(resultatsplots, "/kegg_graph_median.png"), dpi = 100)
```


### HALLMARKS amb Gene Symbol

```{r}
library(msigdbr)
library(fgsea)
```

```{r}
# GeneList
geneList<-table_DEG_complete$logFC
names(geneList)<-table_DEG_complete$ID
geneList<-geneList[order(geneList, decreasing = TRUE)]


msigdbr_df <- msigdbr(species = "human", category = "H")


# fixing format to work with fgsea

pathwaysH = split(x = msigdbr_df$gene_symbol, f = msigdbr_df$gs_name)

# run fgsea enrichment

set.seed(123)
fgseaRes <- fgsea(pathways=pathwaysH, geneList)

fgseaRes <- fgseaRes %>% 
  filter(padj<=0.25)

fgseaRes$leadingEdge_1<-
unlist(lapply(fgseaRes$leadingEdge, function (x) paste0(x,collapse = ",")))

fgseaRes<- fgseaRes %>% 
  select(-leadingEdge)
```

```{r}
datatable_jm(fgseaRes)
```


```{r}
# Representació gràfica 

fgseaRes <-
fgseaRes %>% 
  mutate(NES_cat=ifelse(NES<0,"Down","Up"))

num<-20

fgseaRes_1 <- fgseaRes %>%
  group_by(NES_cat) %>% 
  arrange(pval) %>% 
  slice_head(n=20) %>% 
  group_by(pathway) %>% 
  
  mutate(pathway_mod=
           ifelse(length(strsplit(pathway, "")[[1]])>num,paste0(paste0((strsplit(pathway, ""))[[1]][1:num],collapse = ""), "..."),pathway))%>% 
   ungroup()%>% 
   arrange(pval) %>% 
  mutate(pathway_mod=paste0(row_number(),":",pathway_mod))

fgseaRes_graph <- fgseaRes_1 %>% 
    group_by(NES_cat) %>%
    slice_head(n=10) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = NES, y = fct_reorder(pathway_mod, NES))) + 
    geom_segment(aes(yend = pathway_mod,colour = pval), xend = 0, size=3) +
    geom_point(aes(color = pval),size = 5) +
    theme_bw(base_size = 15) +
    theme(text = element_text(size=12))+
    # scale_colour_gradient(limits=c(0, pvalue), low="red") +
    ylab(NULL)+
    facet_grid(.~NES_cat,scales = "free")+
  scale_colour_continuous(low = "#f29191",
                         high = "#4ca4fc")

fgseaRes_graph


png(paste0(resultatsplots, "/hallmarks_median_graph.png"),width = 900,height = 600,res=100)
fgseaRes_graph
dev.off()

save(fgseaRes, file=paste0(resultatstaules, "/hallmarks_median"))
write.csv(fgseaRes, file=paste0(resultatstaules, "/hallmarks_median.csv")) 

```

## Correlació PLAC8 amb diferents sets de gens
### Molecular subtyping
```{r}
# Molecular subtyping (set of genes):
genes_mol_sub <- c("GATA6", "CDH1","HNF4A", "FOXA1", "KT5", "FAT2", "S100A2", "VIM", "PTHLH", "P63")

# Correlacionar gen PLAC8 amb els gens anteriors:

# matriu_exprs[gset_norm@featureData@data$ID[gset_norm@featureData@data$ID=="PLAC8"]]

# table(gset_norm@featureData@data$ID==genes_mol_sub[10])
# Falten gens KT5 i P63

# "GATA6"= "ILMN_1695041"
# "CDH1"= "ILMN_1770940"
# "HNF4A"= "ILMN_1698546" "ILMN_1739886" "ILMN_2372124"
# "FOXA1"="ILMN_1766650"
# "FAT2""ILMN_2128931"
# "S100A2","ILMN_1725852"
# "VIM", "ILMN_1782538" "ILMN_2058251"
# "PTHLH", "ILMN_1785699" "ILMN_2314169"

# sondes_mol_sub <- c("ILMN_1695041", "ILMN_1770940", "ILMN_1698546", "ILMN_1739886", "ILMN_2372124", "ILMN_1766650", "ILMN_2128931", "ILMN_1725852", "ILMN_1782538","ILMN_2058251", "ILMN_1785699", "ILMN_2314169")

# cortest<- cor.test(matriu_exprs[rownames(matriu_exprs)=="ILMN_1653026"], matriu_exprs[gset_norm@featureData@data$ID==sondes_mol_sub[2]])

taula_cor_test <-matrix(nrow=length(genes_mol_sub), ncol = 2)
i=1
for (i in 1:length(genes_mol_sub)) {
  gen_in_matrix <- sum(gset_norm@featureData@data$ID==genes_mol_sub[i])
 if(gen_in_matrix>0){
  matriu_plac <-matriu_exprs[gset_norm@featureData@data$ID=="PLAC8",]

  matriu_2 <-matriu_exprs[
  gset_norm@featureData@data$ID==genes_mol_sub[i],]          

cortest <- cor.test(matriu_plac,matriu_2)
taula_cor_test[i,1]<-cortest$estimate
taula_cor_test[i,2]<-cortest$p.value
row.names(taula_cor_test)<- genes_mol_sub
row.names(taula_cor_test)<- gset_norm@featureData@data$ID[match(row.names(taula_cor_test), gset_norm@featureData@data$ID)]
colnames(taula_cor_test)<- c("cor", "pvalue")
}}

taula_cor_test <- taula_cor_test[complete.cases(taula_cor_test),]

```

Taula de correlacions gen PLAC8 amb els diferents gens del set Molecular subtyping.

```{r}
datatable_jm(taula_cor_test)

```
